author: jimmygchen
content:
A more detailed write-up on this, nothing new from what we discussed earlier, but just hoping to give others a bit of context and get some feedback from the EL teams: 
https://hackmd.io/@jimmygchen/HkUpFliYJx

author: jtraglia
content: Nice! This looks great. I'd also like to share that it'll soon be possible for CLs to "extend blobs" ("compute cells" is more clear IMO btw ðŸ™‚). We've added the function to the specs (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4128) and implemented it in ckzg (https://github.com/ethereum/c-kzg-4844/pull/534). Hope to have a new ckzg release with this sometime next week.

author: parithosh
content: hmm i tried resyncing lighthouse-geth-5,prysm-geth-5 and teku-geth-5 and they all fail with the EL crashing on the electra slot. Does someone have ideas? I know lodestar was also struggling with this when genesis syncing <@931591385545584640> . It could also be a config issue, but if a node produced the block then the same one should be able to sync it too

author: matthewkeil
content:
So we were able to get around those two on the PeerDAS image. We are getting rejected with "building on previous invalid block". I didn't see the invalid root 
 Error but it's possible that error got buried and all we saw was our error when we submitted the next block. Will dig in the logs again when I'm at the keys
